GK20hdratn_u:61: dvīpād anyasmād api madhyād api jalanidher diśo 'py antāt /

GK20hdratn_u:109: tataḥ praviśaty āsanastho gṛhītavasantotsavaveṣo rājā vasantakaś ca /

GK20hdratn_u:122: ṇa bhavado ṇa kāmadevassa mama jjevva ekkassa bamhaṇassa aaṃ maaṇamahūsavo tti jeṇa piavaasseṇa tumaṃ ti mantīadi /

GK20hdratn_u:224: ayam aham āgata eva makarandodyānam iti /

GK20hdratn_u:250: api ca /mūle gaṇḍūṣasekāsava iva bakulair vamyate puṣpavṛṣtyā
GK20hdratn_u:251: madhvātāmre taruṇyā mukhaśaśini cirāc campakāny adya bhānti /
GK20hdratn_u:260: tataḥ praviśati vāsavadattā kāñcanamālā sāgarikā vibhavataś ca parīvārāḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:269: adha kettia dūre dāṇiṃ so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ mae bhaavado maaṇassa pūā ṇivvattidavvā /
GK20hdratn_u:274: iaṃ khu ṇirantarubbhiṇṇakusumasohiṇī bhaṭṭiṇīe parigahidā māhavīladā /
GK20hdratn_u:275: esā khu avarā ṇomāliāladā jāe aālakusumasamuggamasaddhālueṇa bhaṭṭiṇā appā āāsīadi /
GK20hdratn_u:276: tā edaṃ adikkamia dīsadi jjevva so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ devī pūaṃ ṇivvattaissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:284: aaṃ so rattāsoapāavo jahiṃ pūaṃ nivvattaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:285: teṇa hi me pūāṇimittāiṃ uvaaraṇāiṃ uvaṇehi /
GK20hdratn_u:292: jassa daṃsaṇapadhādo rakkhīadi tassa jjevva diṭṭhigoaraṃ paḍidā bhave /
GK20hdratn_u:296: kīsa tumaṃ ajja maaṇamahūsavaparāhīṇe pariaṇe sāriaṃ ujjhia idha āadā /
GK20hdratn_u:298: edaṃ pi savvaṃ pūovaaraṇaṃ kañcaṇamālāe hatthe samappehi /
GK20hdratn_u:300: tathā kṛtvā kati cit padāni gatvātmagatam /
GK20hdratn_u:302: evvaṃ pi atthi me kodūhalaṃ pekkhiduṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:303: kiṃ jadhā tādassa anteure bhaavaṃ aṇaṅgo accīadi idha vi tadhā jevva kiṃ vā aṇṇadha tti /
GK20hdratn_u:306: jāva idha pūāsamao bhodi tāva ahaṃ pi bhaavantaṃ maaṇaṃ jevva pūiduṃ kusumāiṃ avaciṇissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:336: sahatthadiṇṇakusumakuṅkumacandaṇathāsaehiṃ sohidaṃ kadua rattāsoapāavaṃ accīadu bhaavaṃ pajjuṇṇo /
GK20hdratn_u:348: api ca / anaṅgo 'yam anaṅgatvam adya nindiṣyati dhruvam /
GK20hdratn_u:349: yad anena na saṃprāptaḥ pāṇisparśotsavas tava // 22 // (1.22)
GK20hdratn_u:355: teṇa hi uvaṇehi me kusumāiṃ vilevaṇaṃ ca /
GK20hdratn_u:364: tā imiṇā sinduvāraviḍavena vāridā bhavia pekkhāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:367: paccakkho jjevva bhaavaṃ kusumāuho pūaṃ paḍicchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:368: tā ahaṃ pi imehiṃ kusumehiṃ idhaṭṭhidā jevva bhaavantaṃ kusumāuhaṃ pūaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:376: tā jāva ṇa ko vi pekkhadi tāva jjevva gamissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:392: āsthānīṃ samaye samaṃ nṛpajanaḥ sāyantane saṃpatan /
GK20hdratn_u:393: saṃpraty eva saroruhadyutim uṣaḥ pādāṃs tavāsevituṃ
GK20hdratn_u:397: aaṃ so rāā udaaṇo jassa ahaṃ tādeṇa diṇṇā /
GK20hdratn_u:398: tā parapesaṇakarisidaṃ me sarīraṃ edassa daṃsaṇeṇa bahumadaṃ samvuttaṃ /

GK20hdratn_u:411: mandabhāinīe mae pekkhiduṃ pi ciraṃ ṇa pārido aaṃ jaṇo /
GK20hdratn_u:423: adha kahiṃ dāṇiṃ mama hatthe imaṃ sāriaṃ ṇikkhivia gadā me piasahī sāariā bhavissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:425: esā khu ṇiuṇiā ido jjevva āacchadi /

GK20hdratn_u:431: kahiṃ dāṇiṃ tumaṃ vimhaākhittahiaā via idhaṭṭhidaṃ maṃ avadhīria ido adikkamasi /

GK20hdratn_u:437_2: karissadi tti edaṃ vuttantaṃ devīe ṇivediduṃ pesida mhi /
GK20hdratn_u:440: (2.6) Nipuṇikā / diṭṭhā mae sāariā gahidasamuggaacittaphalaavaṭṭiā kaalīharaṃ pavisantī /
GK20hdratn_u:445: tataḥ praviśati gṛhītacitraphalakā madanāvasthāṃ nāṭayantī sāgarikā /
GK20hdratn_u:450: jeṇa jjevva diṭṭhametteṇa īdiso saṃtāvo vaṭṭadi puṇo vi taṃ jevva pekkhiduṃ ahilasasi tti aho de mūḍhadā /
GK20hdratn_u:452: jammado pahudi saha saṃvaḍḍhidaṃ imaṃ jaṇaṃ pariccaia khaṇamettadaṃsaṇaparicidaṃ jaṇaṃ aṇuacchanto ṇa lajjasi /
GK20hdratn_u:459: ṇijjidasurāsuro bhavia itthījaṇaṃ paharanto ṇa lajjasi /
GK20hdratn_u:460: savvadhā mama mandabhāiṇīe imiṇā duṇṇimitteṇa avassaṃ maraṇaṃ uvaṭṭhidaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:462: tā jāva ṇa ko vi idha āacchadi tāva ālekkhasamappidaṃ taṃ ahimadaṃ jaṇaṃ pekkhia jadhāsamīhidaṃ karissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:463: sāvaṣṭambham ekamanā bhūtvā nāṭyena phalakaṃ gṛhītvā niḥśvas
GK20hdratn_u:464: ya / jai vi adisaddhaseṇa vevadi aaṃ adimettaṃ me aggahattho tadhā vi tassa jaṇassa aṇṇo daṃsaṇovāo ṇatthi tti jadhā tadhā ālihia pekkhissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:470: kiṃ uṇa esā garuāṇurāākhittahiaā ālihantī ṇa maṃ pekkhadi /
GK20hdratn_u:471: tā jāva diṭṭhipadhaṃ se pariharia ṇirūvaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:472: svairaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'syāḥ sthitvā dṛṣṭvā ca saharṣam /
GK20hdratn_u:476: adha vā ṇa kamalāaraṃ vajjia rāahaṃsī aṇṇassiṃ ahiramadi /
GK20hdratn_u:479: kiṃ uṇa ṇivaḍantabāhasalilā me diṭṭhī pekkhiduṃ ṇa pahavadi /
GK20hdratn_u:480: ūrdhvam aśrūṇi saṃharantī susaṃgatāṃ dṛṣṭvottarīyeṇa pracchādayantī vilokya smitaṃ kṛtvā /
GK20hdratn_u:492: kiṃ uṇa suṇṇaṃ via cittaṃ paḍibhādi /
GK20hdratn_u:493: tā ahaṃ pi ālihia radisaṇādhaṃ karissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:500: jādiso tae kāmadevo ālihido tādisī mae radī ālihidā /
GK20hdratn_u:501: tā aṇṇadhāsaṃbhāviṇi kiṃ tuha ediṇā ālavideṇa /
GK20hdratn_u:508: tā tadhā karesu jadhā ṇa avaro ko vi edaṃ vuttantaṃ jāṇissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:511: īdisassa kaṇṇaāraanassa avassaṃ jevva īdise vare ahilāseṇa hodavvaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:512: tadhā vi jadhā ṇa ko vi avaro edaṃ vuttantaṃ jāṇissadi tadhā karemi /
GK20hdratn_u:513: edāe uṇa medhāviṇīe sāriāe ettha kāraṇeṇa hodavvaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:514: kadā vi esā imassa ālāvassa gahidakkharā kassa vi purado mantaissadi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:516: ado vi me adhiadaraṃ saṃtāvo vaṭṭadi /
GK20hdratn_u:520: jāva imādo digghiādo ṇaliṇīvattaāiṃ muṇāliāo a geṇhia lahuṃ lahuṃ āacchāmi /
GK20hdratn_u:521: niṣkramya punaḥ praviṣṭā nāṭyena nalinīpattrāṇi sāgarikāyā hṛdaye nikṣipati /
GK20hdratn_u:528: piasahi visamaṃ pemmaṃmaraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ ṇavaram ekkaṃ // 26 // (2.1)
GK20hdratn_u:531: kaṇṭhe kṛttāvaśeṣaṃ kanakamayam adhaḥ śṛṅkhalādāma karṣan
GK20hdratn_u:534: prabhraṣṭo 'yaṃ plavaṅgaḥ praviśati nṛpater mandiraṃ mandurāyāḥ // 27 // (2.2)
GK20hdratn_u:535: api ca /naṣṭaṃ varṣavarair manuṣyagaṇanābhāvād apāsya trapām
GK20hdratn_u:536: antaḥ kañcukikañcukasya viśati trāsād ayaṃ vāmanaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:537: paryantāśrayibhir nijasya sadṛśaṃ nāmnaḥ kirātaiḥ kṛtaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:542: eso kkhu duṭṭhavāṇaro ido jjevva āacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:550: kadā vi ko vi taṃ pekkhissadi /
GK20hdratn_u:553: eso vi dadhibhattalampaḍo edaṃ pañjaraṃ ugghāḍia duṭṭhavāṇaro adikkanto /
GK20hdratn_u:554: esā khu medhāviṇī uḍḍīṇā aṇnado gacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:565: puṇo vi duṭṭhavāṇaro jjevva āacchadi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:569: bhaṭṭiṇo parivāsavattī khu eso ajja vasantao /
GK20hdratn_u:581: jeṇa diṇṇametteṇa jjevva dohalaeṇa īdisī ṇomāliā saṃvuttā jeṇa ṇirantarubbhiṇṇakusumagucchacchādidaviḍavā uvahasantī via lakkhīadi devīparigahidaṃ māhavīladaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:584: eso kkhu piavaasso tassa dohalaassa laddhappaccaadāe parokkhaṃ pi taṃ ṇomāliaṃ paccakkhaṃ via kusumidaṃ pekkhanto harisupphullaloaṇo ido jjevva āacchadi /
GK20hdratn_u:591: adyodyānalatām imāṃ samadanāṃ nārīm ivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ
GK20hdratn_u:592: paśyan kopavipāṭaladyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmy aham // 29 // (2.4)
GK20hdratn_u:600: tad ādeśaya mārgaṃ yena vayam api tadālokanena cakṣuṣaḥ phalam anubhavāmaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:604: (2.38) Vidūṣakaḥ / ākarṇya sabhayaṃ nivṛtya rājānaṃ haste gṛhītvā sasaṃbhramam /
GK20hdratn_u:609: edassiṃ baulapāave ko vi bhūdo paḍivasadi /
GK20hdratn_u:614: jai mama vaaṇaṃ ṇa pattiāasi tā aggado bhavia saaṃ jevva āaṇṇehi /
GK20hdratn_u:624: tumaṃ bhaāluo jeṇa sāriaṃ bhūdaṃ ti mantesi /
GK20hdratn_u:626: yad ātmanā kṛtam tan mayi saṃbhāvayasi /
GK20hdratn_u:628: jai evvaṃ mā khu maṃ ṇivāresu /
GK20hdratn_u:634: imiṇā pisuṇajaṇahiaakuḍileṇa daṇḍaaṭṭheṇa paripakkaṃ via phalaṃ imādo baulapāavādo tumaṃ pāḍaissaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:652: jādiso tae kāmadevo ālihido tādisī mae radī ālihidā /
GK20hdratn_u:660: tatsakhyāpi pratyabhijñāya vaidagdhyāt sāpi tatraiva rativyapadeśenālikhiteti /
GK20hdratn_u:670: īdisassa kaṇṇaāraaṇassa avassaṃ jevva īdise vare ahilāseṇa hodavvaṃ ti /
GK20hdratn_u:672: jā esā ālihidā sā khu kaṇṇaā daṃsaṇīā /
GK20hdratn_u:673: (2.55) Rājā / yady evam avahitau śṛṇuvas tāvat /
GK20hdratn_u:683: na kevala śrutam abhiprāyo 'pi lakṣita eva /
GK20hdratn_u:692: esā dāsīe dhīā caduvvedī via bamhaṇo ricāiṃ paḍhiduṃ pauttā /
GK20hdratn_u:702: ko 'nya evaṃvidhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhavantaṃ muktvaivaṃvidhānām ṛcām abhijñaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:708: ujjuaṃ jevva kiṃ ṇa bhaṇāsi jadhā /
GK20hdratn_u:714: kim uccair vihasatā tyayeyam uttrāsitā yenoḍḍīyāny atra kvāpi gatā /
GK20hdratn_u:729: (2.72) Vidūṣakaḥ / kiṃ edāe dāsīe dhīāe sāriāe /

GK20hdratn_u:784: kiṃ ettha parihāsasīladāe imaṃ jaṇaṃ lahuṃ karesi /

GK20hdratn_u:1133: jai sā asāmaṇṇarūvasohā tādisī tae ṇimmidā tā kīsa uṇa īdisaṃ avatthantaraṃ pāvidā /
GK20hdratn_u:1134: iaṃ ca raaṇamālā jīvidaṇirāsāe tāe kassa vi bamhaṇassa hatthe paḍivādesu tti bhaṇia mama hatthe samappidā /

GK20hdratn_u:1141: ajja kkhu piavaasseṇa pasādidāe devīe vāsavadattāe bandhaṇādo moāvia sahatthadiṇṇehiṃ modaehiṃ udaraṃ me pūridaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1155: sā khu tavassiṇī devīe ujjaiṇiṃ pesida tti pavādaṃ kadua addharatte uvaṭṭhide ṇa jāṇīadi kahiṃ ṇīda tti /

GK20hdratn_u:1162: ṇa me īdise patthāve hatthe edaṃ geṇhiduṃ pasaradi /

GK20hdratn_u:1612: yataḥ saṃtāpam evāyaṃ sparśas te harati priye // 81 // (4.18)
GK20hdratn_u:1632: svapne matir bhramati kiṃ nv idam indrajālam // 82 // (4.19)
GK20hdratn_u:1635: bhaṇidaṃ khu teṇa dāsīe puttaeṇa indajālieṇa jadhā /
GK20hdratn_u:1636: avassaṃ jevva deveṇa ekko me kheḍaṇao pekkhidavvo tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1637: (4.150) Rājā / devi / tvadvacanād iyam ānītā sāgarikā /
GK20hdratn_u:1655: esā khu sāariādo pāvida tti bhaṇia amaccajoandharāaṇeṇa mama hatthe ṇikkhittā /
GK20hdratn_u:1659: katham asau mamānivedya kiṃ cit kariṣyati /
GK20hdratn_u:1662: yathā susadṛśī vasantakasya kaṇṭhe ratnamālā asyāś ca sāgarāt prāptis tathā vyaktam eveyaṃ siṃhaleśvarasya duhitā ratnāvalī /
GK20hdratn_u:1685: (4.166) Rājā / katham / udāttavaṃśaprabhavasya siṃhaleśvarasya vikramabahor ātmajeyam /
GK20hdratn_u:1688: ṇa kkhu īdiso sāmaṇṇajaṇassa paricchao bhodi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1696: nanv iyaṃ te jyāyasī bhaginī duḥkham āste /
GK20hdratn_u:1698: (4.170) Ratnāvalī / samāśvasya rājānaṃ tiryag avalokya svagatam /
GK20hdratn_u:1712: amaccajoandharāaṇeṇa ettiaṃ kālaṃ dujjaṇīkida mhi jeṇa jāṇanteṇa vi ṇa me ṇivedidaṃ /
GK20hdratn_u:1715: devyā madvacanād yathābhyupagataḥ patyur viyogas tathā
GK20hdratn_u:1716: sā devasya kalatrasaṃghaṭanayā duḥkhaṃ mayā sthāpitā /
GK20hdratn_u:1717: tasyāḥ prītim ayaṃ kariṣyati jagatsvāmitvalābhaḥ prabhoḥ
GK20hdratn_u:1718: satyaṃ darśayituṃ tathāpi vadanaṃ śaknomi no lajjayā // 83 // (4.20)
GK20hdratn_u:1719: atha vā kiṃ kriyata īdṛśam atyantamānanīyeṣv api niranurodhavṛtti svāmibhaktivratam /
GK20hdratn_u:1737: yo 'syāḥ pāṇigrahaṇaṃ kariṣyati sa sārvabhaumo rājā bhaviṣyatīti /
GK20hdratn_u:1738: tatas tatpratyayād asmābhiḥ svāmino 'rthe bahuśaḥ prārthyamānenāpi siṃhaleśvareṇa devyā vāsavadattāyāś cittakhedaṃ pariharatā yadā na dattā /
GK20hdratn_u:1741: tadā lāvaṇake devī dagdheti prasiddhim utpādya tadantikaṃ bābhravyaḥ prahitaḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1744: atheyaṃ devīhaste kim ity anucintya sthāpitā /
GK20hdratn_u:1745: (4.181) Vidūṣakaḥ / aṇācakkhidaṃ pi edaṃ jāṇīadi jjevva jadhā /
GK20hdratn_u:1746: anteuragadā suheṇa de daṃsaṇapadhaṃ gamissadi tti /
GK20hdratn_u:1752: anyathāntaḥpure baddhāyā asyāḥ kuto devena darśanam /
GK20hdratn_u:1755: parijñātāyāś ca bhaginyāḥ saṃprati yathā karaṇīyaṃ tatra devī pramāṇam /
GK20hdratn_u:1758: phuḍāṃ jevva kiṃ ṇa bhaṇāsi jadhā /
GK20hdratn_u:1764: ettiaṃ pi dāva mama bahiṇiāṇurūvaṃ bhodu /
GK20hdratn_u:1765: iti ratnāvalīṃ svakīyair ābharaṇair alaṅkṛtya haste gṛhītvā rājānam upasṛtya /
GK20hdratn_u:1769: ko devyāḥ prasādaṃ na bahu manyate /
GK20hdratn_u:1773: tā tadhā karesu jadhā bandhujaṇaṃ ṇa sumaredi /
GK20hdratn_u:1786: (4.196) Rājā / kim ataḥ param api priyam asti / yataḥ /
GK20hdratn_u:1789: devī prītim upāgatā ca bhaginīlābhāj jitāḥ kosalāḥ
GK20hdratn_u:1790: kiṃ nāsti tvayi saty amātyavṛṣabhe yasmin karomi spṛhām // 84 // (4.21)
GK20hdratn_u:1792: urvīm uddāmasasyāṃ janayatu visṛjanvāsavo vṛṣṭim iṣṭām
GK20hdratn_u:1794: ākalpāntaṃ ca bhūyat samupacitasukhaḥ saṃgamaḥ sajjanānāṃ
GK20hdratn_u:1795: niḥśeṣā yāntu śāntiṃ piśunajanagiro durjayā vajralepāḥ // 84 // (4.22)
